name: Imagination Game
description:
Fun little game made for my masters project.  I loved playing with paper planes at school, each time I threw it, it was anything but just paper to me. I always imagined it to be a real plane, a fighter jet, space ship and what have you but it was always fun to let my imagination run wild. I tried to recreate that experience in Unity with this project. This is the first draft of the project, I want to make some more improvements on it in the future.  

For the first level - Avoid the bubbles and head for the portal

For the second level - its a surprise :) 

Have Fun.
